newsitem.title: USA: Elbit Systems files for 4mln share offer.
newsitem.headline: Elbit Systems files for 4mln share offer.

text.p: Elbit Systems Ltd filed Wednesday with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to register an offering of up to four million ordinary shares, of which the company will sell three million shares and the remaining one million shares will be sold by subsidiary Elbit Defense Holdings Ltd.
Underwriters for the offering, Salomon Brothers Inc, Credit Suisse First Boston, Oppenheimer & Co Inc and Smith Barney Inc, have an over-allotment option of up to 450,000 shares.
The Halfa, Israel-based maker of defense electronics, said it will sue the proceeds from the shares it sells to finance working capital needed including the growth of its business.
After the offering, the company will have 24,386,130 shares outstanding.
